name: Forkscythe
description:
Are you ready to test your skills and bravery in the ultimate horror action game? Introducing Forkscythe, a retro FPS unlike any other. Set in a nightmarish world overrun by attacking skulls, you'll need quick reflexes and strategic thinking to survive.

Forkscythe is a fast-paced difficult retro FPS horror action indie video game



As you fight your way through an arena filled with obstacles and enemies, you'll need to use your trusty weapons to cut down everything in your path. But be careful – these skulls won't go down easily. With fast-paced gameplay and challenging difficulty, Forkscythe will keep you on the edge of your seat from start to finish.



But the horrors don't end there. With strange graphics and a wild soundtrack, Forkscythe will have you feeling like you're really in the midst of a nightmare. Can you make it out alive? Find out in Forkscythe, the ultimate horror action game!

Deadly arena, Dangerous enemies, Powerful weapons



  • Mirror
  • Barrels
  • Chests
  • Medkits
